name: Verify letter after Renewal Quote Letter checkbox selected on Renewal quote

testSteps.description: And underwriter is on home page
When underwriter selects Quote for Renewal transaction on policy
And Underwriter select Renewal Quote Letter checkbox on Quote and Insured Info screen
Then Renewal Quote Letter should be attached
